name: Sallie Gardner at a Gallop

description: Blacksmith Scene is a short starring Charles Kayser and John Ott. Three men hammer on an anvil and pass a bottle of beer around.

name: Carmencita

description: The Black Cat is a movie starring Robert Frost, Robyn Baker, and Sadie French. A mentally unbalanced man is obsessed with the idea that a black cat is possessed. He tortures and kills it. Later, he comes to believe that the cat has...

name: Too Much Johnson
description: Too Much Johnson is a movie starring Joseph Cotten, Virginia Nicolson, and Edgar Barrier. A woman has two lovers. When one man finds out about the other, he acts as a villain and chases after the protagonist.

name: Le chant du Styrène
description: Le chant du Styrène is a short starring Pierre Dux and Sacha Vierny. Poetic and aesthetic visit of a large polystyrene factory.

name: Soigne ton gauche
description: Soigne ton gauche is a short starring Jacques Tati, Max Martel, and Louis Robur. A boxer is out in the country with his entourage, training for his next fight. Meanwhile, on the farm nearby, Roger is neglecting his chores. As he...

name: Poveri milionari
description: Poveri milionari is a movie starring Maurizio Arena, Renato Salvatori, and Lorella De Luca. Salvatore has an accident that makes him lose his memory and becomes director of the department store where his brother-in-law works.

name: Nude on the Moon
description: Nude on the Moon is a movie starring Marietta, William Mayer, and Lester Brown. A rich rocket scientist organizes an expedition to the moon, which they discover is inhabited by nude women.

name: King: A Filmed Record... Montgomery to Memphis
description: King: A Filmed Record... Montgomery to Memphis is a movie starring Paul Newman, Joanne Woodward, and Ruby Dee. Follows Martin Luther King's life and decades long civil rights activism.

name: Le lit de la vierge
description: Le lit de la vierge is a movie starring Zouzou, Pierre Clémenti, and Tina Aumont. A loose Biblical allegory starring the legendary model-artist-musician Zouzou as Mary Magdalene, French actor Pierre Clémenti as Jesus and the...

name: Blonde Crazy
description: Blonde Crazy is a movie starring James Cagney, Joan Blondell, and Louis Calhern. The adventures of an egoistic con man and his glamorous accomplice.

name: Space Is the Place
description: Space Is the Place is a movie starring Barbara Deloney, Sun Ra, and Raymond Johnson. Sun Ra--space-age prophet, pharoanic jester, shaman-philosopher and avant-jazz keyboardist/bandleader--lands his spaceship in Oakland, having been...

name: The Flash
description: The Flash is a movie starring Ben Affleck, Michael Keaton, and Ezra Miller. The plot is unknown. Feature film based on the comic book superhero, The Flash.

name: Avatar 3
description: Avatar 3 is a movie starring Michelle Yeoh, Zoe Saldana, and David Thewlis. Sequel of Avatar 2 (2022). The plot is unknown.

name: Avatar 4
description: Avatar 4 is a movie starring Michelle Yeoh, Zoe Saldana, and Sam Worthington. Sequel of Avatar 3 (2024). The plot is unknown.
